snippet.title: Johnny Depp Breaks His Silence After Amber Heard Files For Divorce
snippet.description:
The statement on behalf of the ‘Alice Through the Looking Glass’ actor revealed that he is looking to divorce “quickly”.

In addition, the spokesperson addressed the loss of Johnny’s beloved mother, Betty Sue Palmer, who died just days before news of the couple’s split emerged.

The statement said: “Given the brevity of this marriage and the most recent and tragic loss of his mother, Johnny will not respond to any of the salacious false stories, gossip, misinformation, and lies about his personal life.

“Hopefully the dissolution of his short marriage will be resolved quickly.”Johnny Depp has broken his silence three days after his wife, Amber Heard, filed for divorce, citing ‘irreconcilable differences.’

The 52-year-old actor released a statement amid reports that he did not have a prenuptial agreement in place and his soon-to-be ex-wife was seeking spousal support.
tags: Johnny Depp Breaks His Silence After Amber Heard Files For Divorce
